resources.string: Control the snake to eat food and grow longer. The goal is to achieve the highest score possible without hitting the walls or the snake\'s own body.

• Swipe UP to move the snake upward
• Swipe DOWN to move the snake downward
• Swipe LEFT to move the snake to the left
• Swipe RIGHT to move the snake to the right

The snake will continue moving in the chosen direction until you swipe to change it.

• The snake grows longer each time it eats food
• Your score increases with each food item eaten
• The game ends if the snake hits the wall
• The game ends if the snake collides with its own body
• The snake's speed may increase as you progress

Good luck and have fun!
